title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...
author: Hanna, William
snippet: All the neighbouring roads, with the various streets through which the procession passed, from Morningside on to Lauriston, and from Lauriston to the burying ground, a distance, by this circuitous route, of considerably  more than two miles, were lined thick with people.

title: The Scottish cavalier;
author: Grant, James
snippet: He breathed more freely as his followers traversed the deserted road that led to the barrier of Bristo, and thence striking westward, proceeded by a narrow horseway leading to the thatched haiulet and manor-house of Lauriston, &
